history.narrative: Law 15-188, the “Youth Pollworker Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-124, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 4, 2004, and June 1, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 23, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-455 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-188 became effective on September 30, 2004.
